Name: Gold
Functional Text: **Action** - {r}{r}, destroy Gold: Draw a card. **Go again**

Name: Squizzy & Floof
Functional Text: At the start of each opposing hero's turn, they may create a Cracked Bauble in their hand. If they do, you create a Gold token.

Name: Ravenous Rabble
Functional Text:
When this attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. This gets -X{p}, where X is the pitch value of the card revealed this way.

**Go again**

Name: Runner Runner
Functional Text: When this attacks, if it has **go again**, create an Agility token.

Name: Double Down
Functional Text:
You may destroy a Gold you control rather than pay Double Down's {r} cost.

The next attack that **wagers** this turn gets +3{p} and **overpower**.

If a hero would create 1 or more tokens from a **wager** this turn, instead they create that many plus 1 of each of those tokens.

**Go again**

Name: Talk a Big Game
Functional Text:
Choose a number. The next time you deal that much or more {p} damage to a hero this turn, create that many Might tokens.

**Go again**

Name: Wrecker Romp
Functional Text: As an additional cost to play this, discard a random card.

Name: Seismic Surge
Functional Text: At the beginning of your action phase, destroy this, then the next Guardian attack action card you play this turn costs {r} less to play.

Name: Agility
Functional Text: At the start of your turn, destroy this, then your next attack this turn gets **go again**.

Name: Might
Functional Text: At the start of your turn, destroy this, then your next attack this turn gets +1{p}.

Name: Vigor
Functional Text: At the start of your turn, destroy this, then gain {r}.

Name: Wall of Meat and Muscle
Functional Text: When this defends, if you control a Might token, you may put an attack action card from your graveyard on top of your deck.

Name: Run into Trouble
Functional Text: When this defends, if you control an Agility token, deal damage to the attacking hero.

Name: Hearty Block
Functional Text: When this defends, if you control a Vigor token, gain 1{h}.

Name: Brutus, Summa Rudis
Functional Text:
You may have cards with **clash** of any class or talent in your deck.

If all heroes in a **clash** would fail to win, instead choose which hero wins the clash.
